Articles.Content:
I can't install any mods I tried very popular mods ike MechJeb and KAX. What am I doing wrong?

I installed it in C:\Program Files (86x)\Steam\steamapps\common\kerbal space program\Game Data

My System specs:

Processor4th Generation Intel Core i7-4510U Processor (2.00GHz 1600 MHz 4MB)Operating systemWindows 8.1 64Display15.6" FHD LED Glossy Wedge (1920x1080)GraphicsNVIDIA GeForce 820M 2GBMemory8.0GB PC3-12800 DDR3L SDRAM 1600 MHzHard Drive1TB 5400 RPMOptical DriveDVD Recordable (Dual Layer)Network CardIntelÃ‚Â® Dual Band Wireless-AC 3160BluetoothBluetooth Version 4.0WarrantyOne yearBattery4 Cell 41 Watt Hour Lithium-Ion

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-27T00:24:07Z" title="05/27/2015 12:24  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 27, 2015</time> by Robot\_SQuid**
What procedure are you following to install the mods? And what exactly does "can't install" mean? Are the mods not showing up in your game, or is there some other problem?
